Trade/Device Name(s): BD BACTEC Plus Aerobic/F Blood Culture medium
BD BACTECTM Plus Aerobic/F Blood Culture Medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD BACTEC Plus Aerobic/F Blood Culture medium for aerobic culture and recovery of microorganisms from blood using BD BACTEC Fluorescent Series Instruments
Indications for Use Summary: Used in a qualitative procedure for aerobic culture and recovery of microorganisms (bacteria and yeast) from blood, primarily with BD BACTEC Fluorescent Series Instruments
